name: Abercrombie & Fitch Co.
description: Abercrombie & Fitch Co. is a global retailer of casual wear and accessories, well-known for its iconic brand identity and youthful appeal. Founded in 1892, the company has a rich history and has evolved over the years to cater to a diverse range of customers. Abercrombie & Fitch operates several brand lines, including Abercrombie Kids, Hollister Co., and the flagship Abercrombie & Fitch brand. The company's products are characterized by a casual, laid-back style that resonates with teens and young adults. Abercrombie & Fitch focuses on providing an immersive shopping experience both in-store and online, leveraging modern digital marketing strategies and a strong social media presence to engage with its target audience. The company is committed to sustainability and ethical sourcing, aiming to create a positive impact on the environment and the communities in which it operates. Through its innovative designs and marketing campaigns, Abercrombie & Fitch continues to adapt to changing consumer preferences while maintaining its core values of authenticity and quality.

key_executives.name: Scott L. R. H. S. H. S. S. A. A. H. S.

seo.meta_title: Abercrombie & Fitch Co. | Casual Fashion Retailer
seo.meta_description: Explore Abercrombie & Fitch Co., a leading retailer of casual apparel and accessories. Discover our commitment to quality, style, and sustainability.

faq.question: What does Abercrombie & Fitch sell?
faq.answer: Abercrombie & Fitch sells casual apparel and accessories for men, women, and kids.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Abercrombie & Fitch?
faq.answer: Fran Horowitz is the CEO of Abercrombie & Fitch Co.

faq.question: Where is Abercrombie & Fitch headquartered?
faq.answer: Abercrombie & Fitch is headquartered in New Albany, Ohio, USA.

faq.question: What brands does Abercrombie & Fitch operate?
faq.answer: Abercrombie & Fitch operates Abercrombie Kids, Hollister Co., and the Abercrombie & Fitch brand.
